title: Ep. 581 - We Hardly Knew ‘Ye
description:
Kanye drops out of the race, Trump dumps his campaign manager, and Twitter gets hacked.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvC
